name: rat tail
description: A rat's tail, a trophy item to prove you've slain the rats.

name: goblin ears
description: A pair of goblin ears tied together with some of the goblin's hair it came from. A trophy item to prove you're a goblin slayer.

name: dragon fang
description: A fang pulled from the skull of a slain dragon.
A scale skinned from a dragon. It is extremely durable, and a highly valued commodity.
